import devAssert from'../jsutils/devAssert';/**
 * Given a GraphQLError, format it according to the rules described by the
 * Response Format, Errors section of the GraphQL Specification.
 */export function formatError(error){error||devAssert(0,'Received null or undefined error.');var message=error.message||'An unknown error occurred.';var locations=error.locations;var path=error.path;var extensions=error.extensions;return extensions?{message:message,locations:locations,path:path,extensions:extensions}:{message:message,locations:locations,path:path};}/**
 * @see https://github.com/graphql/graphql-spec/blob/master/spec/Section%207%20--%20Response.md#errors
 */
